definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Bao3 gang1 Ji2 tuan2 Gong1 si1

sentences.english: "Haibao" has displayed the abundant Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: “海寶”這個吉祥物反映了豐富的中國文化。
上海世博會的吉祥物是什麼？海寶。

sentences.english: I'm Haibao, the mascot of Expo 2010 Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 我是海寶，2010年上海世博會的吉祥物。

sentences.english: The mascot is a child named "Haibao".
sentences.chinese: 這個吉祥物叫“海寶”，是一個藍色的小孩。

sentences.english: This Happy Haibao craft is made by authorization of the Bureau of Shanghai World Expo Coordination.
sentences.chinese: “快樂海寶”經上海世博會事務協調局授權制造發行。
用猜的方式引入新朋友海寶。

definition: the mantis stalks the cicada, unaware of the oriole behind (idiom, from Daoist classic Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子); to pursue a narrow gain while neglecting a greater danger
to pause at appropriate points in reading aloud unpunctuated writing/to punctuate
to digress/to stray from the subject
"sensational headline writers", people who write misleading titles in order to generate clicks from Internet users/clickbait
Children's Day (June 1st), PRC national holiday for children under 14
